snippet: An evacuation order is lifted in one town as crews gain an upper hand.
abstract: Evacuated residents and business owners will be allowed to return to Mogollon, NM, as fire crews battling the largest wildfire in the state's history continue to make progress.
lead_paragraph: An evacuation order is lifted in one town as crews gain an upper hand.

headline.seo: Firefighters Make Progress With New Mexico’s Largest Wildfire
headline.main: Firefighters Make Progress in New Mexico
headline.print_headline: Firefighters Make Progress In New Mexico
